resources.string:
Find you app by not more than 2 click. 
Click app icon to stop it, 
Click app name to launch, 
click app version to uninstall, 
long click app name: add shortcut, 
long click shortcut to remove it.
Easy Browser is a very small, fast, simple and powerful browser. You can view page source, share web address and snap shot to your friends. \n\nLong click history/bookmark to delete it.

Only root user can delete system app.

Delete system app may cause phone can not boot.

Please think carefullyÔºÅ
